Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who are using a device to communicate over a distance.
The student can show that the device uses string to connect two points for communication.
The student can illustrate how sound travels along the string to enable communication.
The student can depict materials that are provided and used to build the string telephone.
The student can demonstrate an understanding of the device providing a solution to the communication problem over long distances.
The student can represent a real-world situation where communicating over a distance is important.
